Posts.Content: I honestly would be too x But, please don't be freaking yourself out, by reading anything, and everything about Breast Cancer. Everybody has a different. unique experience, and that won't help you. x I was diagnosed on the 23rd December 2017. I'm still here hunny x You've got friends here, to chat to you about everything, and anything xx Please try and sleep well X    I'm here for you anytime x
Posts.Title: How long between referal and receiving appointment?

Posts.Content: Hi hunny, Please don't worry. I know, easier said than done. You did right going to the G.P. and it's their fault it wasn't sent away.   Now if I was you, I'd make an appointment tomorrow with your G.P. and tell him/her that you're not moving until they phone the hospital about the referral. Please don't stress X
Posts.Title: How long between referal and receiving appointment?
